mapper.select: SELECT team_and_strategy.strategy_name FROM team_and_strategy,team_strategy WHERE team_strategy.course_id = #{courseID} AND team_strategy.strategy_name = 'TeamAndStrategy' AND team_strategy.strategy_id = team_and_strategy.id AND team_and_strategy.strategy_name != 'MemberLimitStrategy'

SELECT c.id id,c.course_id courseID,c.max_member maxMember,c.min_member minMember,t.teacher_name teacherName, c2.course_name courseName FROM course_member_limit_strategy c,team_strategy,team_and_strategy t1,team_and_strategy t2,teacher t,course c2 WHERE team_strategy.course_id = #{courseID} AND team_strategy.strategy_name = 'TeamAndStrategy' AND team_strategy.strategy_id = t1.id AND t1.strategy_name = 'TeamAndStrategy' AND t1.strategy_id = t2.id AND t2.strategy_name = 'CourseMemberLimitStrategy' AND t2.strategy_id = c.id AND c2.id = #{courseID} AND c2.teacher_id = t.id

SELECT c.id id,c.course_id courseID,c.max_member maxMember,c.min_member minMember,t.teacher_name teacherName, c2.course_name courseName FROM course_member_limit_strategy c,team_strategy,team_and_strategy t1,team_or_strategy t2,teacher t,course c2 WHERE team_strategy.course_id = #{courseID} AND team_strategy.strategy_name = 'TeamAndStrategy' AND team_strategy.strategy_id = t1.id AND t1.strategy_name = 'TeamOrStrategy' AND t1.strategy_id = t2.id AND t2.strategy_name = 'CourseMemberLimitStrategy' AND t2.strategy_id = c.id AND c2.id = #{courseID} AND c2.teacher_id = t.id

SELECT c.id id,c.course_id courseID,t2.teacher_name teacherName,c2.course_name courseName FROM conflict_course_strategy c,team_strategy t,course c2,teacher t2 WHERE t.course_id = #{courseID} AND t.strategy_name = 'ConflictCourseStrategy' AND t.strategy_id = c.id AND c2.id = #{courseID} AND c2.teacher_id = t2.id
